Class ExternalSynapse

  • java.lang.Object
    • SynapsePackage.AbstractSynapse
      • SynapsePackage.ExternalSynapse

  • public class ExternalSynapse
extends AbstractSynapse
    Author:
    lss receives input from outside of the system. May be any type of synapse

        weight - weight for thissynapse
